name: Quiz Nanairo Dreams: Nijiirochou no Kiseki
overview: Quiz Nanairo Dreams: Nijiirochou no Kiseki ( "Quiz Seven Color Dreams - Miracle of Rainbow Color Village") is a Japanese board game developed by Capcom. Gameplay is a hybrid of a quiz game and a dating sim where your chances of wooing each girl depends on how fast and accurate your answers are. This game supports up to two players who can work together to achieve the ultimate goal to restore the seven crystals held by each girl and use them to vanquish the Devil.
